name: absled
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), cle, c1), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), cle, c1), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), cle, c1), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), cle, c1), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), cle, c1), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), cle, c1), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), cle, c1), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cfv(cabs, c0), cle, c1), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))

comment: Absolute value and 'less than or equal to' relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
